survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Streaming Music Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on customer satisfaction with subscription-based music streaming services, exploring usage patterns, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which subscription-based music streaming service do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Ensure 'Other' includes an open-text field for specification. Mobile-friendly dropdown recommended.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice dropdown with 'Other' triggering a text input.

script.question_text: Which subscription-based music streaming service do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary music streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure options are evenly spaced for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons with horizontal layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary music streaming service?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q1

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in your music streaming service? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q2
questions.client_notes: Multi-select with a max of 3 choices. Randomize option order to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkboxes with validation for â‰¤3 selections.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in your music streaming service? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q2

questions.question_text: How frequently do you discover new music through your streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q3
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Tooltip: 'Discovery includes algorithm recommendations, playlists, or curated content.'
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons with vertical layout.

script.question_text: How frequently do you discover new music through your streaming service?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q3

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your music streaming service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q4
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Set a 500-character limit.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text area with character counter.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your music streaming service?
script.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents after Q4
